properties.Name: CouponIssueReason
properties.Description:
The reason the coupon was issued.

Ex:
- Part of a promotion
- Reward for activity
- Customer voluntarily gave up seat
- Customer bumped from scheduled flight
- Delayed flight
- Compensation for an inconvenience

Columns.Name: CouponIssueReasonId
Columns.Description: The unique identifier of a Coupon Issue reason.

Columns.Name: CouponIssueReasonName
Columns.Description: The name of a Coupon Issue reason.

Columns.Name: CouponIssueReasonDescription
Columns.Description: The description of a Coupon Issue reason.
